Organization Name: AGING AND DISABILITY RESOURCE CENTER (ADRC) OF TARRANT COUNTY | AGING DISABILITY RESOURCE CENTER OF TARRANT COUNTY | UTILITY ASSISTANCE
Description: Assists with electric, gas, and water bills for individuals age 60 and older in Tarrant County once every six months based on the service date.

Organization Name: ARLINGTON URBAN MINISTRIES (AUM) | MAIN OFFICE | EMERGENCY ASSISTANCE
Description:
Provides emergency assistance for utilities for Arlington residents facing a crisis. Can assist with antibiotics. Pays up to $125 on a utility bill.
**For bills greater than $100, the client must pay a portion of the bill and show proof of payment (receipt or confirmation number). Note: The agency does not assist with deposits, but may be able to assist with reconnection or late fees, depending on the Utility Company (Does not assist with TXU fees). Any person who connects with a shelter/partnering agency is entered into a shared information system that is managed by the Housing Related Coordinated Entry Lead Agency, and there are multiple access points. NOTE: This agency is an access point.

Organization Name: COMMUNITY ACTION PARTNERS FORT WORTH NEIGHBORHOOD SERVICES (CAP) | ANDREW DOC SESSION CENTER | FORWARD HOME PROGRAM
Description:
Provides one-time payments for rent, mortgage, and utilities (water, electric, and gas).
Note: The agency assists with Reliant Customers, among other electric providers. By making this referral, we know you fit the basic eligibility for this service. However, the referral to this agency is not a guarantee of assistance.
Note: The agency does not assist with deposit, reconnection, or late fees; Only usage.

Organization Name: MISSION GRANBURY | RESOURCE CENTER | EMERGENCY ASSISTANCE NETWORK (EAN)
Description: Provides limited emergency financial assistance with rent, utilities, and medication. Other needs will be considered on a case by case basis. By making this referral, we know you fit the basic eligibility for this service. However, the referral to this agency is not a gurantee of assistance.Does not provide financial assistance with utility reconnection, utility deposits, or rent deposits.

Organization Name: SOCIETY OF ST VINCENT DE PAUL (SVDP) - FORT WORTH DISTRICT COUNCIL | HOLY FAMILY CONFERENCE | BASIC NEEDS - HOLY FAMILY CONFERENCE
Description: Provides limited financial assistance for rent and utility bills based on available funding; will provide additional community resources if no funding is available. Funding availability varies as this comes from donations. NOTE: The agency will attempt to help anyone meeting their eligibility, but sometimes funding is not available at the time the help-seeker calls.

Organization Name: ALEDO UNITED METHODIST CHURCH | MAIN OFFICE | HELPING HANDS MONDAY - THURSDAY FOOD AND FINANCIAL ASSISTANCE
Description: Provides a food pantry with canned food items and emergency financial assistance with utilities (electric, gas, water) for residents of Parker County.Note: This agency assist with reconnection or late fees, as long as they have the bill.

Organization Name: LAKESIDE BAPTIST CHURCH | CHURCH SITE | COMMUNITY CARE - BASIC NEEDS
Description: Provides financial assistance for utilities (electric and water) on a case-by-case basis for Hood and Somervell counties.Note: The agency does not assist with deposits or reconnection fees.

Organization Name: MANNA STOREHOUSE | MAIN OFFICE | MON - FRI BASIC NEEDS
Description: Provides free clothing, food, furniture and household items; utility and prescription assistance.Note: The agency does not assist with deposit and reconnection or late fees.

Organization Name: PECAN VALLEY CENTERS FOR BEHAVIORAL AND DEVELOPMENTAL HEALTHCARE | ADMINISTRATION OFFICE | BASIC NEEDS FOR VETERANS
Description: Provides financial assistance for veterans that includes rent, utilities (gas, water, electricity), phone, dental restoration (Fillings, crowns, dentures, bridges, implants), and counseling available for individual, group, and family.

Organization Name: ARBORLAWN UNITED METHODIST CHURCH | MAIN OFFICE | EMERGENCY ASSISTANCE
Description: Provides limited financial assistance ($100 limit) for utilities ONE TIME ONLY to eligible households.Note: The agency does provide assistance with deposit, reconnection or late fees on a case by case basis.

Organization Name: WISE AREA RELIEF MISSION | MAIN OFFICE | FINANCIAL ASSISTANCE
Description: Provides financial assistance to eligible families for utilities (electricity, water, and propane/natural gas). Also assists with emergency prescription and tooth extraction.Note: The agency does not assist with deposits and reconnection fees, but they may be able to assist with late fees.

Organization Name: MISSION ARLINGTON/MISSION METROPLEX | ARLINGTON SITE | FINANCIAL ASSISTANCE
Description:
Provides help with partial rent and utilities (electricity, water, gas, etc.) payments. Note: The agency assists with Reliant Customers, among other electric providers. Offers help with medications; On a limited basis, a portion of a prescription cost is paid. client has to pay at least half of the rent or utility bill.
NOTE: Wait time may be extensive depending upon how many people are waiting in the lobby.

Organization Name: HARVEST HOUSE | MAIN OFFICE | BASIC NEEDS ASSISTANCE
Description: Provides rent and utility assistance.

Organization Name: PARKER COUNTY CENTER OF HOPE | PARKER COUNTY CENTER OF HOPE | FINANCIAL ASSISTANCE
Description: Provides limited financial assistance with utilities, prescriptions, and medical copay.Note: The agency does not assist with deposit, reconnection fees, or late fees.

Organization Name: MINERAL WELLS CENTER OF LIFE | MAIN OFFICE | UTILITY ASSISTANCE
Description: Provides utility assistance that includes electric, water, and gas bill to low-income families who are struggling with a temporary crisis.Note: The agency does not assist with deposit, reconnection fees, or late fees.

Organization Name: SAGINAW UNITED METHODIST CHURCH | SAGINAW UNITED METHODIST CHURCH | UTILITY ASSISTANCE
Description: Provides utility assistance to Saginaw residents in need.

Organization Name: SAINT VINCENT DE PAUL ST. JUDE CONFERENCE | ST THOMAS HALL | UTILITY ASSISTANCE
Description: Provides financial assistance for utility bills (electric, gas and water) for eligible households.

Organization Name: GRACE PLACE MINISTRIES | MAIN OFFICE | BENEVOLENCE PROGRAM
Description: Provides food, diapers, and limited financial assistance with rent, utilities, and some prescription assistance. Note: The agency does not assist with deposit and reconnection and late fees. By making this referral, we know you fit the basic eligibility for this service. However, the referral to this agency is not a guarantee of assistance.

Organization Name: WESTHILL CHURCH OF CHRIST | BRIDGE CENTER | FINANCIAL MINISTRY
Description: Offers financial assistance for prescriptions, utilities (electric, water and gas) as well as gasoline, depending on availability of funds.Note: The agency does not assist with deposit, reconnection or late fees; Usage only.
